# modus-slider



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                  | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled`  | (optional) Whether the slider is disabled. * | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `label`    | `label`     | (optional) The slider's label.               | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `maxValue` | `max-value` | (optional) The slider's maximum value.       | `number`  | `100`       |
| `minValue` | `min-value` | (optional) The slider's minimum value.       | `number`  | `0`         |
| `value`    | `value`     | (optional) The slider's value.               | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event         | Description                                 | Type                  |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| `valueChange` | An event that fires on slider value change. | `CustomEvent<string>` |
| `valueInput`  | An event that fires on slider value input.  | `CustomEvent<string>` |
